TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDuplexChannel implements class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannel, class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel, class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IOutputChannel, class System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject

Docs.summary: Defines the interface that a channel must implement to both send and receive messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IDuplexChannel> interface is the union of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IOutputChannel> interfaces. The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IDuplexChannel> interface does not mandate any correlation between the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IOutputChannel> when implemented. This means, in particular, that the contract does not mandate that the sender of messages that are received through the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel> is equal to the recipient of messages sent through the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IOutputChannel>.
